description: left; close-up view of a jagged, rugged landscape sculpted by lava flow; sweeping downward plane at C with dramatically intersecting cliffs at L and R; greens and moss punctuate the cliffs; cluster of red and gold foliage at L; gnarled and broken tree trunks along bottom; inscription ULQ
medium: Ink, color, gold, and gofun on silk
title: Volcanic Landscape
